statement.p: Daran is conducting market research on the amount typically spent on the purchase of a first vehicle. Daran has determined that the average cost of a first vehicle is 6100, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 680.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected first-time vehicle purchase is more than 6750. (Round to 4 decimal places.)
